reasoning: The test expected a UI element for workflow propagation that was never designed to exist. The code-level functionality (PropagateWorkflowToChildren) is triggered programmatically, not via a dedicated UI element. The test incorrectly assumed that backend code should have a corresponding UI.
evidence_summary: Screenshot 1 shows the Our Products page with child pages, Versioning and Workflow both Off. Screenshot 2 shows the Advanced > More tab containing only Security and Cache Settings - no workflow propagation UI exists here by design. The UI is functioning correctly; the test was looking for functionality that is only available programmatically.
scenario_id: Evoq.PersonaBar.Workflow::Page Workflow Management::Apply workflow to child pages (propagation)
